title: SPA (Single-page application)
summary: An SPA (Single-page application) is a web app implementation that loads only a single web document, and then updates the body content of that single document via JavaScript APIs such as XMLHttpRequest and Fetch when different content is to be shown.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
